metadata.title: USN-6361-1 -- CUPS vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that CUPS incorrectly authenticated certain remote requests. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain recently printed documents.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6361-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libcups2-dev - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 cups-bsd - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 cups-common - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 cups-core-drivers - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 cups-server-common - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 libcupsimage2 - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 cups-client - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 cups-ipp-utils - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 libcups2 - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 cups-ppdc - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 cups - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 libcupsimage2-dev - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 cups-daemon - 2.4.1op1-1ubuntu4.6 No subscription required
